targets.expr: sum(rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_schedule_attempts_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (cluster, workspaceType)
sum(rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_schedule_attempts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", result!="scheduled"}[5m])) by (cluster, workspaceType, result)
sum(rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_preemption_attempts_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (cluster)
sum(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pending_pods{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (cluster, queue)

sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="regular"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="regular"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)

panels.title: Attempts until succesful scheduling - Regular workspaces

targets.expr:
sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="regular"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="regular"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)

sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="prebuild"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="prebuild"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)

panels.title: Attempts until succesful scheduling - Prebuild workspaces

targets.expr:
sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="prebuild"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="prebuild"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)

sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="ghost"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_pod_scheduling_attempts_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="ghost"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)

panels.title: Attempts until succesful scheduling - Ghost workspaces

targets.expr:
sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="ghost"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="ghost"}[5m])

sum(

  ) by (cluster)

panels.title: Attempts until succesful scheduling - Probe workspaces

targets.expr:
sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="probe"}[5m])
  ) by (cluster)
  /
    sum(
    rate(gitpod_ws_scheduler_e2e_scheduling_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster",workspaceType="probe"}[5m])

kube_pod_container_info{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", image=~".+", container="scheduler"}

panels.description:
Saturation > 100% means that the container is requesting more than its limits.

Kubernetes will start to throttle CPU when that happens. That's a sign of degraded performance.

'No Data' indicates that the pod has no CPU limits.
panels.title: CPU Saturation

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="POD", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster, node)

panels.description:
Memory can't be throttled. When a container reaches 100% of its memory limits,  Kubernetes will kill the container and restart it.

'No Data' indicates that the pod doesn't have Memory limits.
panels.title: Memory Saturation

targets.expr: rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[1m])
kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"} == 1
kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster", deployment="ws-scheduler"}
kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{cluster=~"$cluster", deployment="ws-scheduler"}
kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{cluster=~"$cluster", deployment="ws-scheduler"}
